titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to take certain tribally-owned reservation land into trust for the Puyallup Tribe.
To direct the Secretary of the Interior to take certain tribally-owned reservation land into trust for the Puyallup Tribe.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 109-422.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 231.

bill.summary: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to take certain tribally-owned reservation land into trust for the Puyallup Tribe.
